mapper.select: SELECT cstudio_group.* FROM (cstudio_user INNER JOIN cstudio_usergroup ON cstudio_user.username = cstudio_usergroup.username WHERE cstudio_user.username = #{username}) INNER JOIN cstudio_group ON cstudio_usergroup.groupid = cstudio_group.id

SELECT cstudio_role.* FROM ((cstudio_user INNER JOIN cstudio_usergroup ON cstudio_user.username = cstudio_usergroup.username WHERE cstudio_user.username = #{username}) INNER JOIN cstudio_group ON cstudio_usergroup.groupid = cstudio_group.id) INNER JOIN cstudio_role ON cstudio_group.roleid = cstudio_role.id

SELECT cstudio_permission.* FROM ((((cstudio_user INNER JOIN cstudio_usergroup ON cstudio_user.username = cstudio_usergroup.username WHERE cstudio_user.username = #{username}) INNER JOIN cstudio_group ON cstudio_usergroup.groupid = cstudio_group.id) INNER JOIN cstudio_role ON cstudio_group.roleid = cstudio_role.id) INNER JOIN cstudio_rolepermission ON cstudio_role.id = cstudio_rolepermission.roleid) INNER JOIN cstudio_permission ON cstudio_rolepermission.permissionid = cstudio_permission.id)
